metadata.title: Sakroots Women's Bag in Eco-Twill, Multifunctional Purse with Adjustable Strap & Zipper Pockets, Sustainable & Durable Design
features: 100% Eco-Twill made from REPREVE material from recycled water bottles

ADVENTUROUS, ARTISTIC & FUNCTIONAL: The Sakroots Artist Circle Basic Crossbody Bag is designed with an adjustable strap for added comfort. This all-in-one tote, backpack and handbag combines everyday functionality with womens fashion
PERFECT FOR EVERYDAY TRAVEL: Features a main zipper closure, 2 front pockets, back zipper pocket, and an interior with a back wall zipper pocket and 2 front wall multi-functional pockets

ENVIRONMENTALLY CONSCIOUS DESIGN: Bag exterior is Repreve Eco-Twill, which is durable, water repellent, stain resistant, and made from recycled materials including plastic bottles. Bag interior is PETA-approved and Vegan Certified Repreve Lining
DIMENSIONS & CARE: Bag dimensions are 12.25” L x 2.75” W x 9.5” H. Strap drop is up to 23”. To clean, wipe with barely damp cloth and let air dry

ART FOR A CAUSE: Sakroots is a free-spirited lifestyle brand featuring exclusive artist prints mixed with craft details. All bags are vegan-certified and our prints support Oceana, whose mission is to protect and restore the world’s oceans
description: The Sakroots Basic Crossbody Bag is sustainably designed with a colorful printed and coated cotton canvas for flair and durability, and an adjustable strap for added comfort. With the functionality of a tote, backpack and handbag in one, this crossbody style is perfect for everyday wear.
